info.name: Contract Purchase Agreements
info.description:
This collection has been forked from standard structure and contains an intial folder structure and examples to aid in creating the required postman tests. Some folders contain scripts that should not be modified and will be indicated at the biginning of the script.

This collection should be named to reflect the Integrator it is testing.

item.name: LOVs
Examples
REST Example

item.description:
This folder contains the tests for the REST column named.

A Search test is required if the column is searchable, otherwise a Shortlist test is required. Note that neither of these tests are required if the column is not 'Is Sheet Column'. These test simulate the form field.

Should the column have loose dependencies, the test above should include all dependent values. A second 'Search/Shortlist no loose dependencies' test should be created that has all loose dependency values removed.

A MultiRow test is required to simulate validation and should contain multiple validation values.

item.name: OBIEE Example

exec: // IMPORTANT! When updating expectedQuery or expectedResults, please beautify this script afterwards via https://beautifier.io/
// REQUIRED: Define the report type - OBIEE or REST
// REQUIRED: Define the expected results as a JSON object. This can be obtained from the console when first being run
// NOTE: If the actual results change, make sure to analyse why they have changed before updating the expected results -
// - Simply overriding the expected results whenever the actual results change invalidates the test
// Set the formatted expected results as an environment variable
// OPTIONAL: Set array of columns to excluded from results comparrison eg ["LastUpdateDate","CurrentDate"]

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
    <soapenv:Body>
        <pub:runReport>
            <pub:reportRequest>
                <pub:reportAbsolutePath>REPORT_PATH</pub:reportAbsolutePath>
                <pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>-1</pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>
                <pub:attributeLocale>en-US</pub:attributeLocale>
                <pub:attributeTemplate>Default</pub:attributeTemplate>
                <pub:attributeFormat>xml</pub:attributeFormat>
                <pub:byPassCache>true</pub:byPassCache>
                <pub:flattenXML>false</pub:flattenXML>
                <pub:parameterNameValues>
                    <!-- <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>DEPENDENCY</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item></pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item> -->
                    <!-- <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>REPORT_RESTRICT_FIELD</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>Value1</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>Value2</pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item> -->
                    <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>REPORT_SEARCH_FIELD</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>ABC%</pub:item><!-- search fileds should restrict to return a few rows -->
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item>
                </pub:parameterNameValues>
            </pub:reportRequest>
        </pub:runReport>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

item.description:
This folder contains the tests for the OBIEE column named.

A Search test is required if the column is searchable, otherwise a Shortlist test is required. Note that neither of these tests are required if the column is not 'Is Sheet Column'. These test simulate the form field.

Should the column have loose dependencies, the test above should include all dependent values. A second 'Search/Shortlist no loose dependencies' test should be created that has all loose dependency values removed.

A MultiRow test is required to simulate validation and should contain multiple validation values.

This folder contains examples for each type of LOV that can be duplicated as the starting point for your columns tests.

Do NOT duplicate this folder. It has a script that prevents its contents from being run when using the TestRunner environment. Instead, duplicate the required folder below this.

ie: either the REST or OBIEE Example

This folder must not be moved, renamed, or deleted.

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
    <soapenv:Body>
        <pub:runReport>
            <pub:reportRequest>
                <pub:reportAbsolutePath>/Custom/More4apps-Procurement/Procurement/Purchase Agreements/Blanket Purchase Agreements/BPA_Procurement_BU_REPORT.xdo</pub:reportAbsolutePath>
                <pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>-1</pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>
                <pub:attributeLocale>en-US</pub:attributeLocale>
                <pub:attributeTemplate>Default</pub:attributeTemplate>
                <pub:attributeFormat>xml</pub:attributeFormat>
                <pub:byPassCache>true</pub:byPassCache>
                <pub:flattenXML>false</pub:flattenXML>
                <pub:parameterNameValues>
                    <!-- <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>DEPENDENCY</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item></pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item> -->
                    <!-- <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>PERSON_NUMBER</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>US1 Business Unit</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>UK1 Something else</pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item> -->
                    <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>PROCUREMENT_BU_SEARCH</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>%</pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item>
                </pub:parameterNameValues>
            </pub:reportRequest>
        </pub:runReport>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
  <soapenv:Body>
    <pub:runReport>
      <pub:reportRequest>
        <pub:reportAbsolutePath>REPORT_PATH</pub:reportAbsolutePath>
        <pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>-1</pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>
        <pub:attributeLocale>en-US</pub:attributeLocale>
        <pub:attributeTemplate>Default</pub:attributeTemplate>
        <pub:attributeFormat>xml</pub:attributeFormat>
        <pub:byPassCache>true</pub:byPassCache>
        <pub:flattenXML>false</pub:flattenXML>
        <pub:parameterNameValues>
          <pub:item>
            <pub:name>_PARAM</pub:name>
            <pub:values>
              <pub:item>%</pub:item>
            </pub:values>
          </pub:item>
          <!-- exclude all sections in one request -->
          <pub:item>
            <pub:name>EXCLUDE__SECTION_PARAM</pub:name>
            <pub:values>
              <pub:item>Y</pub:item>
            </pub:values>
          </pub:item>
          <pub:item>
            <pub:name>HAS__BRANCH_CRITERIA_PARAM</pub:name>
            <pub:values>
              <pub:item>N</pub:item>
            </pub:values>
          </pub:item>
        </pub:parameterNameValues>
      </pub:reportRequest>
    </pub:runReport>
  </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

This folder must not be moved, renamed, or deleted.

exec: // IMPORTANT! When updating expectedQuery or expectedResults, please beautify this script afterwards via https://beautifier.io/
// REQUIRED: Define the report type - OBIEE or REST
// REQUIRED: Define the expected results as a JSON object. This can be obtained from the console when first being run

const expectedResults = {"AGREEMENT_STATUS_SEARCH":"%","AGREEMENT_STATUS":"","G_1":[{"MEANING":"Canceled","LOOKUP_CODE":"CANCELED","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is canceled and therefore cannot be used for ordering."},{"MEANING":"Finally Closed","LOOKUP_CODE":"FINALLY CLOSED","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is finally closed meaning all ordering activity on it is complete and it can now be archived and purged."},{"MEANING":"Incomplete","LOOKUP_CODE":"INCOMPLETE","DESCRIPTION":"Document is pending further authoring and submission."},{"MEANING":"On Hold","LOOKUP_CODE":"ON HOLD","DESCRIPTION":"Indicates that ordering activity on agreement is temporarily suspended. Ordering can resume once the hold is removed."},{"MEANING":"Open","LOOKUP_CODE":"OPEN","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is open for ordering."},{"MEANING":"Pending Approval","LOOKUP_CODE":"PENDING APPROVAL","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is pending approval."},{"MEANING":"Pending Catalog Authoring","LOOKUP_CODE":"PENDING CATALOG AUTHORING","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is transferred to supplier or catalog administrator for adding catalog data to it in the form of agreement lines."},{"MEANING":"Pending Change Approval","LOOKUP_CODE":"PENDING CHANGE APPROVAL","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is pending the approval of a change proposed by the buyer or the supplier."},{"MEANING":"Pending Signature Preparation","LOOKUP_CODE":"PENDING SIGNATURE","DESCRIPTION":"Purchase agreement is pending signature preparation."},{"MEANING":"Pending Supplier Acknowledgment","LOOKUP_CODE":"PENDING ACKNOWLEDGMENT","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is pending acknowledgment from supplier."},{"MEANING":"Rejected","LOOKUP_CODE":"REJECTED","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement is rejected during approval or by the supplier during acknowledgment."},{"MEANING":"Sent for Signature","LOOKUP_CODE":"SENT FOR SIGNATURE","DESCRIPTION":"Purchase agreement is sent for signature."},{"MEANING":"Withdrawn","LOOKUP_CODE":"WITHDRAWN","DESCRIPTION":"Agreement was removed or returned by the procurement agent while it was pending approval or acknowledgment."}]};

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
    <soapenv:Body>
